info.name: Trochlear nucleus
info.description: This trochlear nucleus contains the lower motor neurons of the trochlear nerve. It is located in the midbrain at the level of the inferior colliculi. On a cross section of the midbrain, it is located at the inferior aspect of the periaqueductal gray matter. The nerve fibers exit the nucleus, encircle the cerebral aqueduct, decussate in the superior medullary velum prior to their exit immediately caudal to the inferior colliculi.
